item.name: Implementation Use Cases
Get OAuth Token for Resource Owner environments

request.description:
Use this API to request an oAuth token when the environment is a Resource Owner environment. You can see which oAuth flow an environment supports by looking at the Environment page in the OHIP Developer Portal. For more information see (Authenticating to Oracle Hospitality Property APIs)\[[https://docs.oracle.com/en/industries/hospitality/integration-platform/ohipu/c_oracle_hospitality_property_apis.htm#AuthenticatingToOracleHospitalityPr-1BD54F80](https://docs.oracle.com/en/industries/hospitality/integration-platform/ohipu/c_oracle_hospitality_property_apis.htm#AuthenticatingToOracleHospitalityPr-1BD54F80)\] under the heading "Resource Owner-Based Authentication".

To call this API you will need:

1. To know the environment is a Resource Owner environment - see above
2. A valid ClientId and ClientSecret
3. An integration user and its password that has been approved by the environment owner
4. A valid application key
    

Because of this, oAuth tokens may only be used when calling the given environment.

oAuth tokens expire after 60 minutes. We recommend obtaining a new oAuth token every 50 minutes, but not more frequently.

item.name: Get OAuth Token for Client Credentials environments

request.description:

You can see which oAuth flow an environment supports by looking at the Environment page in the OHIP Developer Portal. To call this API you will need:

1. To know the environment is a Client Credentials environment - see above
2. A valid ClientId and ClientSecret
3. A valid EnterpriseId
4. A valid application key
    

Because of this, oAuth tokens may only be used when calling the given environment.

oAuth tokens expire after 60 minutes. We recommend obtaining a new oAuth token every 50 minutes, but not more frequently.

query.description: Additional, ArPayment, Batch, BatchDeposit, BatchDepositRefund, Billing, CheckIn, CheckInManualAuth, Deposit, EndOfDay, EndOfDayDeposit, Manual, Other, PasserBy, PostIt, PreCheckIn, Refund, Schedule

request.description:
In the response, you will see all available options you can then pass in a new request, to find the details for that subject.
EG name = ProfileIdCountries.  Now you can post the request - {{HostName}}/lov/v1/listOfValues/ProfileIdCountries

You will also see in the response of this request if the "name" has parameters than can be passed in the request too, and if they are mandatory or not.

item.name: 01-05. Distribution APIs

exec: pm.test("Save the Distribution Token to environment variable", function () {

request.description:
This is required to access the OPERA Cloud Distribution REST APIs.

The username and password for Distribution API are provided by Oracle Hospitality Distribution channel onboarding process, by Oracle, along with your channelCode.

### Obtaining a token

To obtain a token include the following body parameters:

- **username**. set this to your OPERA Cloud Distribution username.
    
- **password**. Set this to your OPERA Cloud Distribution user's password.

exec: font-family: "Oracle Sans Regular", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

request.description:
This operation allows a channel to retrieve multi-property availability summary with basic information returned.

Channel must send at least one hotel code and stay criteria to see if the properties are available, and what is their minimum and maximum price across all room types.

exec: font-family: "Oracle Sans Regular", Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;

{{ratePlanCode}} - {{ratePlanName}}
Status: {{availabilityStatus}}
OTA mealPlan: {{mealPlan.mealPlanCode}} - mealPlanDescription: {{mealPlan.mealPlanDescription}}
OTA Rate Plan Type: {{ratePlanType}} - ID Required: {{identificationRequired}}

request.description:
Get property offers for Public rates

Property Offers provides the ability to request a specific property and get a list of available offers (rate plan codes and room types assigned to channel).

There are several search parameters that can be used to filter the search results.

The response will provide information about the property and each **room type** and **rate plan** individually as well as **offers** for each available room type and rate plan combination.

The offers response will also provide information about booking rules, cancellation, deposit, guarantee policies as well as taxes and total price.

Similar to property Offers, this operation allows to request availability for specific offer. This will return same information as get Property Offers, adding a few more content information.

Ideal to present offer before guest decides to book.

Basic reservation guaranteed to Credit Card.

Property must assign an OPERA Cloud reservation/guarantee type to Distribution OTA standard 5.
